title: Can't get old profile to work
content:
Had to re-install Windows 10 Pro 64 bit. Saved Tbird Profiles folder to USB thumb drive. Re-installed Windows then installed latest Tbird version (same one I was using). Opened Choose User Profile > Selected Create Profile > Selected Use the selected profile... > Exited Choose User Profile.

Then went to the thumb drive > Opened a profile folder > Copied everything > Then pasted it into the new profile folder I had just created. Opened TBird but it didn't have any of my settings or emails.

The thumb drive had 3 profile folders in it so I repeated these steps for each folder. But still didn't get my settings, etc.

What am I doing wrong?
creator: t2nrsg5nr8

title: thunderbird password
content: my second laptop has stopped recognising my thunderbird password - i've reset the password on main comp, taken it off put it back on - uninstalled and reinstalled thunderbird - nothing works

title: account di posta
content:
Buongiorno a tutti ultimamente ho un problema con due miei account di posta Mozilla Thunderbird non mi consente di inviare messaggi in quanto mi dice 

  " accesso al server dell'account xxyy non riuscito"

nella fattispecie si tratta di 

- fabrizio.federici@yandex.com - fabrizio-federici@outlook.it

e non mi accetta la password

Pensavo di disinstallare e reinstallare Thunderbird ma in questo caso perdo tutto (account, memoria, cartelle etc) ? Grazie Fabrizio Federici
